attributes.action: stop the extradition of British citizen Babar Ahmad to the US and put him on trial in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Babar Ahmad is a British citizen who has been cleared by British authorities of any wrongdoing. The US has requested his extradition to face charges related to fundraising for Chechen and Taliban rebels. The offences are alleged to have occurred on UK soil. It is only proper that Babar stands trial in the UK. Were he to be extradited, he faces a serious risk of human rights abuses and torture.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the extradition of British citizen Babar Ahmad to the US and put him on trial in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13125.asp

Prime Minister's Office
